name: XPOSED
description:
Pure gameplay - pure fun!

XPOSED is a modern and challenging tribute to the arcade classics.
Avoid opponents, be aware of your surroundings, expose the covered area and have lots of fun.
Uncover dozens of unique backgrounds and unlock more level packs while mastering your skills.
Simple controls, demanding levels, but rewarding experience.

Additional hardware required for Remote Play.

1 player
150MB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
Remote Play
